data.prayer: Jesus, all authority was given to you, and you commanded all disciples in Vraneštica, North Macedonia to make more disciples, and you promised to be with them. May your power and their obedience make more disciples today.
data.verse: All authority in heaven and on earth has been given to me. Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Vraneštica, North Macedonia
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Lord we pray you unite the 1 believers to pray at all times in the Spirit, with all prayer and supplication, for spiritual breakthrough in Vraneštica.
data.verse: in every situation, by prayer and petition, with thanksgiving, present your requests to God.

data.prayer: Father, look after and teach the way that is best for the 1 believers living in Vraneštica, North Macedonia.
data.verse: I will instruct you and teach you in the way you should go. I will counsel you with my loving eye on you.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the disciples in the state of Vraneštica to find a person of peace today, like the Philippian jailer, who heard and was immediately baptized with his whole family.
data.verse: And they spoke the word of the Lord to him and to all who were in his house. And he took them the same hour of the night and washed their wounds; and he was baptized at once, he and all his family.

data.prayer: Jesus, I pray that all the Albanian, Macedonian people will remember and turn to you, Lord God. May all the Albanian, Macedonian people worship before you. For the kingdom of the Albanian, Macedonian people is yours.
Spirit, cause the 1 believers in Vraneštica to obey with immediate, radical, costly obedience, like Abraham.
data.verse: Then God said, “Take your son, your only son, whom you love — Isaac — and go to the region of Moriah. Sacrifice him there as a burnt offering on a mountain I will show you.” Early the next morning Abraham got up and loaded his donkey. He took with him two of his servants and his son Isaac. When he had cut enough wood for the burnt offering, he set out for the place God had told him about.

data.prayer: Jesus, call those who are far off in Vraneštica, North Macedonia, so that they and their family can receive life.
data.verse: For the promise is to you, and to your children, and to all who are far off, even as many as the Lord our God will call to himself.

data.prayer: Father, please raise up every one you have called in Vraneštica, North Macedonia to become worthy of their calling, and offer spiritual sacrifices acceptable to you through Jesus.
data.verse: I urge you to live a life worthy of the calling you have received
